steps.step: Step forward into a left neutral bow as you perform a right vertical outward block and a left straight punch to the ribs.
Pivot into a left forward bow and execute a right reverse punch, also to the ribs.
Pivot back into a neutral bow as you perform a left inward horizontal palm heel to the back of the head. Continue the motion of your left arm and check your opponent's right arm into their body.
Pivot back into a left forward bow as you strike your opponent's face with a right inward circular palm heel claw.
Continue the motion of your right hand circularly as you drop into a close kneel. Strike the top of your opponent's calf with a right hand sword.
Keeping your body low, perform a step-through right knife-edge side kick to the back of your opponent's left leg.
